title: Eternal Taoist King - Novel Updates
tags: Calm Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Honest Protagonist   Immortals   Male Protagonist   Multiple Realms   Nobles   Past Plays a Big Role   Revenge   Romantic Subplot   Skill Creation
author: Nienie Zhuazhua   捏捏爪爪
description:
Have you already died? Thus who can tell me…how high are the heavens? When can I break through the universe?

Originally, as the youngest disciple in Tianhe Mountain, Song Ning had lived with ease and been loved by his kind master. However, a dream brought his sect a massacre. He survived. From then on, destiny, love, conspiracy, death, cultivation…were interwoven with each other in his life.>
